line_1: The rudely frowning scenes her former joys enhance.
line_2: But when at length, awaking from her trance,

line_1: The rudely frowning scenes her former joys enhance.
line_2: In vain she casts around her timid glance,

line_1: For praise which merit might enhance,
line_2: I bring thee envy's bas'lisk glance;
